title: Font on old pharmacy bottles
content:
Can anyone please help me with finding a similar font to the one on these pharmacy bottles. I like that it has the art nouveau features, but is still somehow contemporary and simple.  
Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420101213im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stock-photo-empty-scent-bottles-in-old-pharmacy-8503870_4655.jpg)
author: meister
